00023 #include "clientlist.h"

00025 #include <logger.h>

00032 RainbruRPG::Gui::ClientList::ClientList(QWidget* parent)
00033   :QWidget(parent)
00034 {
00035 
00036   setWindowTitle("Connected clients");
00037 
00038   // The main layout
00039   QVBoxLayout* vb1=new QVBoxLayout();
00040   this->setLayout(vb1);
00041   
00042   // The tree
00043   tree=new QTreeWidget();
00044   tree->setSortingEnabled(true);
00045   QStringList header;
00046   header << tr("Ip") << tr("Port") << tr("Type") << tr("Status") 
00047          << tr("Try");
00048   tree->setColumnCount(5);
00049   tree->setHeaderLabels(header);
00050   vb1->addWidget(tree);
00051 
00052 }
00053 
00057 RainbruRPG::Gui::ClientList::~ClientList(){
00058   delete tree;
00059   tree=NULL;
00060 }
00061 
00070 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ClientList::
00071 addClient(enet_uint32 ip, enet_uint16 port, tNetworkClientType type, 
00072           bool accepted){
00073 
00074   npIdentification npi;
00075   QColor r=Qt::red;
00076 
00077   QString ipText;
00078   ipText.setNum(ip, 16);
00079   ipText=ipText.toUpper();
00080 
00081   QString portText;
00082   portText.setNum(ip);
00083 
00084   QString typeText;
00085   typeText=npi.clientTypeToString(type );
00086 
00087   QString statusText;
00088   if (accepted){
00089     statusText="Accepted";
00090   }
00091   else{
00092     statusText="Refused";
00093   }
00094 
00095   int exists=existingClient(ipText, portText, typeText, statusText);
00096 
00097   // Is this client already listed
00098   if (exists!=-1){
00099     LOGI("This client is already listed");
00100     increaseClientTry(exists);
00101   }
00102   else{
00103     // It is a new client, adding it to the list
00104     QTreeWidgetItem *it= new QTreeWidgetItem(tree);
00105     it->setText(0,ipText );
00106     it->setText(1, portText);
00107     it->setText(2, typeText);
00108     it->setText(3, statusText);
00109     if (!accepted){
00110       it->setTextColor(3, r);
00111     }
00112     it->setText(4, "1");
00113 
00114     tree->addTopLevelItem( it );
00115   }
00116 }
00117 
00128 int RainbruRPG::Gui::ClientList::
00129 existingClient(const QString& ip, const QString& port, const QString& type, 
00130                const QString& status){
00131   int ret=-1;
00132 
00133   for (int i=0;i<tree->topLevelItemCount();i++){
00134     QTreeWidgetItem *it=tree->topLevelItem(i);
00135     if (ip.compare(it->text(0))==0){
00136       if (port.compare(it->text(1))==0){
00137         if (type.compare(it->text(2))==0){
00138           if (status.compare(it->text(3))==0){
00139             ret=i;
00140           }
00141         }
00142       }
00143     }
00144   }
00145   return ret;
00146 }
00147 
00155 void RainbruRPG::Gui::ClientList::increaseClientTry(int row){
00156   QTreeWidgetItem * it=tree->topLevelItem(row);
00157   int i=it->text(4).toInt();
00158   i++;
00159   it->setText(4, QString::number(i)); 
00160 }
